title: David Ogden Stiers
summary: David Allen Ogden Stiers (/ˈstaɪ.ərz/ STY-ərz;[1] October 31, 1942 – March 3, 2018) was an American actor and conductor. He appeared in numerous productions on Broadway, and originated the role of Feldman in The Magic Show, in which he appeared for four years between 1974 and 1978.
